products.title: Vitra Blackout Ash Grey 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: This ash grey blackout vertical blind adds a bold trending shade to your home, whilst blocking the light. Value for money and made from high-quality polyester-based fabric, your new grey blackout vertical blind is perfect for office, bedroom and living rooms. At swift direct blinds, not only is is this dark grey vertical blind hand made to your measurements, by their expert team, it also comes with a free five year guarantee.

products.title: Roma Fuscous Grey - Vertical Blind
products.description: In slate grey and with a classically unadorned design, the sleek blind that is the roma in fuscous grey will bring contemporary cool wherever it's used. Its efficient filter function allows some soft light into the room, easing it in gently without disturbing you. The fuscous grey is miles ahead when it comes to modern style, and will work beautifully with equally trendy yellows and bright pinks, both perfect colour schemes for an up-to-date living room, bedroom, or dining room.

products.title: Roma Grey Nickel - Vertical Blind
products.description: The cool and contemporary grey nickel, from the roma range of filter blinds, is an absolute must if you're going for sleek modern style in your home. Practical as well as smart, the blind's louvres hang deftly and can be pulled aside or tilted with ease. Offset the grey nickel with sunny yellows, fruity limes, or bright oranges to create a trendy and charming colour scheme. Use these striking colour combinations in a bright home office, a relaxing dining room, or a welcoming spare bedroom.

products.title: Roma Athens Grey - Vertical Blind
products.description: In palest grey on a smoothly textured fabric, the athens grey from the roma collection offers a unique yet gentle hue that emits elegance and taste, the perfect look for a modern home. The athens grey lends itself to a coordinating charcoal and dove grey colour scheme, ideal for a home office; or to a palette of deep forest greens and pale greys in the den, complemented by medium, polished woods.

products.title: Voile Fr Moondust Grey 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their voile fabrics are a fabulous modern alternative to the traditional net curtain. Voile fr moondust grey is a semi-translucent stylish, dark grey vertical and is great for freshening up the look of any room. A busy kitchen, bathroom or bedroom will benefit from this delicate, translucent design in ths modern grey shade, that will leave the space feeling open, light and airy. Flame retardant and pollergen-coated, makes this sheer vertical blind a fantastic addition to your living space.

products.title: Essence Silver Frost Venetian Blind - 25mm Slat
products.description: Ooh, how elegant. Its no wonder this metallic silver colour is so popular with fast cars and expensive jewellery. It oozes class and style and will make your home positively sparkle. Its shiny with gentle shimmer, nothing too flashy just tasteful and sophisticated. Metallic ooh, how elegant.

products.title: Arrow Head Grey Roller Blind
products.description: The grey arrow head blind is a great pairing of soft grey and white to create a geometric pattern. Use this blind across your home to make a strong impact and let it become a feature in your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 280cm wide - much wider than most paterned roller blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.
